.cell-code} library(DCVtestkit) library(tibble) library(reactable) library(patchwork) library(sessioninfo) sessioninfo::session_info() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ```{style="max-height: 4.2.1) munsell 0.5.0 2018-06-12 [1] CRAN (R 4.2.1) patchwork * 1.1.2 2022-08-19 [1] CRAN (R 4.2.1) pillar 1.8.1 2022-08-19 [1] CRAN (R 4.2.1) pkgconfig 2.0.3 2019-09-22 [1] CRAN (R 4.2.1) purrr 0.3.5 2022-07-11 [1] CRAN (R 4.2.1) stringr 1.4.1 2022-08-20 [1] CRAN (R 4.2.1) tibble * 3.1.8 2022-07-22 [1] CRAN (R 4.2.1) tidyselect 1.1.2 2022-02-21 [1] CRAN (R 4.2.1) utf8 1.2.2 2021-07-24 [1] CRAN (R 4.2.1) vctrs 0.4.2 2022-09-29 [1] CRAN (R 4.2.1) xfun 0.33 2022-09-12 [1] CRAN (R 4.2.1) yaml 2.3.5 2022-02-21 [1] CRAN (R 4.2.1) [1] D:/DCVtestkit_Output/renv/library/R-4.2/x86_64-w64-mingw32 [2] D:/Rtemp/RtmpuCTyZD/renv-system-library P ── Loaded and on-disk path mismatch. ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── ``` ::: ::: # Data creation ::: {.cell hash='index_cache/html/Data creation_7ca0f7c95406fb06e93d29c2880c07ee'} ```{.r .cell-code} dilution_percent <- c( 10, 20, 25, 40, 50, 60, 75, 80, 100, 125, 150, 10, 25, 40, 50, 60, 75, 80, 100, 125, 150) dilution_batch_name <- c( "B1", "B1", "B1", "B1", "B1", "B1", "B1", "B1", "B1", "B1", "B1", "B2", "B2", "B2", "B2", "B2", "B2", "B2", "B2", "B2", "B2") sample_name <- c( "Sample_010a", "Sample_020a", "Sample_025a", "Sample_040a", "Sample_050a", "Sample_060a", "Sample_075a", "Sample_080a", "Sample_100a", "Sample_125a", "Sample_150a", "Sample_010b", "Sample_025b", "Sample_040b", "Sample_050b", "Sample_060b", "Sample_075b", "Sample_080b", "Sample_100b", "Sample_125b", "Sample_150b") lipid1_area_saturated <- c( 5748124, 16616414, 21702718, 36191617, 49324541, 55618266, 66947588, 74964771, 75438063, 91770737, 94692060, 5192648, 16594991, 32507833, 46499896, 55388856, 62505210, 62778078, 72158161, 78044338, 86158414) lipid2_area_linear <- c( 31538, 53709, 69990, 101977, 146436, 180960, 232881, 283780, 298289, 344519, 430432, 25463, 63387, 90624, 131274, 138069, 205353, 202407, 260205, 292257, 367924) lipid3_area_lod <- c( 544, 397, 829, 1437, 1808, 2231, 3343, 2915, 5268, 8031, 11045, 500, 903, 1267, 2031, 2100, 3563, 4500, 5300, 8500, 10430) lipid4_area_nonlinear <- c( 380519, 485372, 478770, 474467, 531640, 576301, 501068, 550201, 515110, 499543, 474745, 197417, 322846, 478398, 423174, 418577, 426089, 413292, 450190, 415309, 457618) dilution_annot <- tibble::tibble(Sample_Name = sample_name, Dilution_Batch_Name = dilution_batch_name, Dilution_Percent = dilution_percent) lipid_data <- tibble::tibble(Sample_Name = sample_name, Lipid1 = lipid1_area_saturated, Lipid2 = lipid2_area_linear, Lipid3 = lipid3_area_lod, Lipid4 = lipid4_area_nonlinear) ``` ::: ::: {.cell hash='index_cache/html/View dilution_annot_d4ab5af29c3fe43fa8f1dc061f6732ba'} ```{.r .cell-code} dilution_annot |> reactable::reactable( defaultPageSize = 5, bordered = TRUE, highlight = TRUE, paginationType = "jump" ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell hash='index_cache/html/View lipid_data_0d63d55231694bf17495e8b4ac3e2bea'} ```{.r .cell-code} lipid_data |> reactable::reactable( defaultPageSize = 5, bordered = TRUE, highlight = TRUE, paginationType = "jump" ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: # Create dilution table ::: {.cell hash='index_cache/html/Create dilution table_f5e23218dec8b802f32b87214e41b3ca'} ```{.r .cell-code} dilution_table <- DCVtestkit::create_dilution_table( dilution_annot, lipid_data, common_column = "Sample_Name", signal_var = "Area", column_group = "Transition_Name" ) ``` ::: ::: {.cell hash='index_cache/html/View dilution table_47d357ff4817b6401bf6a17988907362'} ```{.r .cell-code} dilution_table |> reactable::reactable( defaultPageSize = 5, defaultColDef = reactable::colDef( minWidth = 200), bordered = TRUE, highlight = TRUE, paginationType = "jump" ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: # Create dilution statistical summary ::: {.cell hash='index_cache/html/Create dilution statistical summary_54043ef38de98df37545aeeb6619a0c2'} ```{.r .cell-code} dilution_summary <- DCVtestkit::summarise_dilution_table( dilution_table, grouping_variable = c("Transition_Name", "Dilution_Batch_Name"), conc_var = "Dilution_Percent", signal_var = "Area") dilution_classified <- DCVtestkit::evaluate_linearity( dilution_summary, grouping_variable = c("Transition_Name", "Dilution_Batch_Name")) ``` ::: ::: {.cell hash='index_cache/html/View dilution_summary_3a19177ae2f0cfa6e7d30be11f7bd5ff'} ```{.r .cell-code} dilution_summary |> reactable::reactable( defaultPageSize = 5, defaultColDef = reactable::colDef( minWidth = 200), bordered = TRUE, highlight = TRUE, paginationType = "jump" ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell hash='index_cache/html/View dilution_classified_f407b1b9af5e500030eeee9a23409422'} ```{.r .cell-code} dilution_classified |> reactable::reactable( defaultPageSize = 5, defaultColDef = reactable::colDef( minWidth = 200), bordered = TRUE, highlight = TRUE, paginationType = "jump" ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: # Export results as Excel ::: {.cell hash='index_cache/html/Export results as Excel_7bd240fd0397e615c3d805f49a921049'} ```{.r .cell-code} DCVtestkit::write_summary_excel( dilution_classified, file_name = "dilution_summary.xlsx") ``` ::: # Export results as pdf ::: {.cell hash='index_cache/html/Export results as pdf_a2e1d2acd985794c12046b24eb3dd260'} ```{.r .cell-code} ggplot_table <- DCVtestkit::add_ggplot_panel( dilution_table, dilution_summary = dilution_classified, grouping_variable = c("Transition_Name", "Dilution_Batch_Name"), conc_var = "Dilution_Percent", signal_var = "Area") # Get the list of ggplot list for each group ggplot_list <- ggplot_table$panel DCVtestkit::view_ggplot_pdf( ggplot_list, filename = "dilution_plot.pdf", ncol_per_page = 2, nrow_per_page = 2) ``` ::: ::: {.cell hash='index_cache/html/View ggplot_list_9706da1e72b87e8f4d024d822eb8afef'} ```{.r .cell-code} patchwork::wrap_plots( ggplot_list, ncol = 2, nrow = 4 ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](index_files/figure-html/View ggplot_list-1.png){fig-alt='A display of dilution curves with summary statistics in ggplot.' width=1440} ::: ::: # Export results as trellis table ::: {.cell page-layout='article' hash='index_cache/html/Export results as trellis table_2d6ae81f7a91a9fa0fd7f5d46ba2508b'} ```{.r .cell-code} trellis_table <- DCVtestkit::add_plotly_panel( dilution_table, dilution_summary = dilution_classified, grouping_variable = c("Transition_Name", "Dilution_Batch_Name"), sample_name_var = "Sample_Name", dil_batch_var = "Dilution_Batch_Name", dil_batch_col = c("#377eb8", "#4daf4a"), conc_var = "Dilution_Percent", conc_var_units = "%", conc_var_interval = 50, signal_var = "Area", have_plot_title = FALSE) trellis_table <- DCVtestkit::convert_to_cog( trellis_table, grouping_variable = c("Transition_Name", "Dilution_Batch_Name"), panel_variable = "panel", col_name_vec = "col_name_vec", desc_vec = "desc_vec", type_vec = "type_vec" ) # Pressing Render button will not create the # index.html file (Though it is not needed) # Call this function via console to create index.html file DCVtestkit::view_trellis_html( trellis_table, grouping_variable = c("Transition_Name", "Dilution_Batch_Name"), trellis_report_name = "Dilution_Plot", trellis_report_folder = "Dilution_Plot_Folder") ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: :::
